评论概述: The plus sizes are not made as well as the regular sizes
评论详情: The black “corset” is attached and only goes along the front. The dress is not made well. My friends and I got these dresses to match for a masquerade ball. They are both skinny. I am not. The black one was well constructed in size large. The purple of was gorgeous in size small. The red in a 5X? Costume fabric and very cheaply made. Also, it runs small. I had to get a 5X even thought I wear a 2X in regular clothing.
Looks nothing like the photos. The bow came off super easily. Lace is not the same.

So I purchased this for my 11 year old as part of her costume and let me tell you she rocked it! She is very developed for her age and filled this out perfectly. It is stunning and Incredibly lightweight. The size fit like a glove. So the sizes are on point. She was able to comfortably move around. It's definitely machine washable. I always turn things inside out and hung it to dry.

评论概述: Arms a little tight at first
评论详情: My only negative mostly is the waist would have preferred it to go all around and a little thicker material but dress is cute for what I was aiming for, (gypsy style). The arms with the lace was a little snug but after a while the lace started to relax. Will post an update once the event gets here.
Center black piece isn't it's own piece. It's part of the dress and only goes half way around. Also didn't come with the black laces shown either. Cheaply made for nearly $50 dress.
You would have to wear a bodysuit under it because you can see straight through the fabric
cheap, can get higher quality costumes at spirit halloween or even a dollar store. would give 0 stars if i could.
Definitely go up a size maybe 2, I used a different corset, the one on the dress was really cheap looking and thin

The purple didn't match the pictures. We bought this for my daughter and it just didn't look like the pictures. We were disappointed that it was such a dull purple-ish plum-ish instead of that nice royal purple in the pictures.
The dress was too big and the material was very cheap for the price.

评论用户: Looks nothing like the picture I'm so disappointed and upset now I have to order something else for Halloween
评论详情: It is nothing like it is described or looks in the picture it's cheap and ugly and it was not worth $21.00

The bottom of the dress is sheath does not have a high-low effect or the flow as pictured. The “corset” is just simulated it contains holes in the front and comes with a shoelace like string to feed through. The lace on top is low quality very delicate feels as if it will rip. The shipping was also very long.

Dress is so cheap looking in person. Was going to wear this for Halloween but I'd be way too embarrassed to wear this. Also corset part is just stitched on the front so when you turn it looks ridiculous because it doesn't continue to the back side.

Quality is absolutely awful as is fit. Not flattering and very cheaply made. Fabric is thinner than most pajama fabric.  This is the ugliest dress I have ever bought and I won’t even wear it for Halloween
This dress was never used because it was to big, and now I can’t return it because the window closed

I was hesitant to purchase with the weird size chart. It’s always tricky being a bigger girl on here. I’m usually a 1x in torrid tops and a 20 on bottom. I ordered the 4x and it fits perfectly

What the picture looks like on Amazon vs what it looks like in person are two separate things. The material used on this is absolutely cheap. I’ve found better dresses at Ross for way cheaper and has better material. Not to mention, if you do not wear a bra you nipples will show. Do not advise spending 50 bucks on this. I ordered this dress in the bright red. It’s a little more orange-red than pictured but still beautiful. I am 5’10 and the length was perfect on me. Waist Line  was a bit short but I assume that is related to my height not a problem with the dress.  The dress is not perfect on me because I am tall, but if you are shorter or Just shorter waisted, the dress is beautiful for the price.
